comment._content: "John Crichton-Stuart, 4th Marquess of Bute KT (20 June 1881 – 25 April 1947) was a Scottish peer." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Crichton-Stuart,_4th_Marquess_... (a lamentable short entry) A photo of him is in The Day book., March 10, 1916, LAST EDITION, Image 20 " 'IS 'IGHNESS DRILLS WITH THE TOMMIES", the article describes him as the richest man in England. See also historyatrandom.wordpress.com/2012/11/23/the-history-of-b....

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59:  Thanks for the additional research. The article in The Day Book was interesting, and it helps to have a matching photograph! We will update this record with more info.
